name: cat coaster
notes:
welcome to my cat coaster crochet pattern – the purrfect way to add some feline fun to your home! whether you’re sipping tea or enjoying a coffee, your mug will have the perfect spot with these cute creations.

**materials**
▢lily sugar n cream - blue jean cotton
▢lily sugar n cream - white cotton
▢4.5 mm hook
▢tapestry needle

**abbreviations (us terms)**
magic ring - mr
chains - ch
single crochet - sc
half double crochet - hdc
double crochet - dc
triple crochet - tr
slip stitch - sl st
increase - inc
